mapper.insert: insert into s_tbl_seller(s_id, s_pw, s_name, s_gender, s_birth, s_phone, s_email, s_zip, s_addr1, s_addr2) values(#{s_id}, #{s_pw}, #{s_name}, #{s_gender}, #{s_birth}, #{s_phone}, #{s_email}, #{s_zip}, #{s_addr1}, #{s_addr2})
mapper.select: select count(1) from s_tbl_seller where s_id = #{s_id} and s_pw = #{s_pw}
